xwikidoc.content: awm.chartmacro.title=AppWithinMinutes Chart Macro awm.chartmacro.desc=This macro allows to show chart and data tables for AppWithinMinutes applications. awm.chartmacro.novalue=No value awm.chartmacro.doc.parameter=Parameter awm.chartmacro.doc.desc=Description awm.chartmacro.doc.defaultValue=Default Value awm.chartmacro.doc.empty=Empty awm.chartmacro.example=Example awm.chartmacro.example.simple=Simple Chart awm.chartmacro.example.function=Chart with function awm.chartmacro.name=AppWithinMinutes Chart awm.chartmacro.exception=Exception awm.chartmacro.query=Query awm.chartmacro.data=Data awm.chartmacro.chart=Chart awm.chartmacro.nodata=No data awm.chartmacro.number=Number rendering.macro.awmchart.name=AppWithinMinutes Chart Macro rendering.macro.awmchart.description=This macro allows to show chart and data tables for AppWithinMinutes applications rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.app.name=Application Name rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.app.description=Application Name to get the data for the chart (corresponds to the space) rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.className.name=Class Name rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.className.description=Class Name used alternatively to an Application name rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.category.name=Category rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.category.description=Field on which the counting is made rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.type.name=Chart type rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.type.description=Chart type (pie / bar / bar3D) rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.title.name=Title rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.title.description=Title of the chart rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.width.name=Width rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.width.description=Width of the chart rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.height.name=Height rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.height.description=Height of the chart rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.table.name=Display Table rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.table.description=Display of the data table (0/1) rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.chart.name=Display Chart rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.chart.description=Display of the chart (0/1) rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.chartClasses.name=Chart CSS Classes rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.chartClasses.description=CSS Classes to add to the chart 'div' rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.tableClasses.name=Table CSS Classes rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.tableClasses.description=CSS Classes to add to the table 'div' rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.useRow.description=Display of a bootstrap row (0/1) rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.colors.name=Colors rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.colors.description=Colors to use for the chart (separated by commas) rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.addParams.name=Chart Additional parameters rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.addParams.description=Additional parameters for the chart (see the [[Chart macro documentation>>url:http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Chart%20Macro]) rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.fromHQL.name=From HQL rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.fromHQL.description=Additional HQL to add to the from part of the query rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.whereHQL.name=Where HQL rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.whereHQL.description=Additional HQL to add to the where part of the query rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.function.name=Function rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.function.description=Function to apply to the category field rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.aggregate.name=Aggregate field rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.aggregate.description=Aggregate field to use instead of count rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.aggregateFunction.name=Aggregate Function rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.aggregateFunction.description=Function to apply to the aggregate rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.orderColumn.name=Order Column rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.orderColumn.description=Column to sort the results on. The default is the first aggregated column rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.orderDirection.name=Order Direction rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.orderDirection.description=Direction to sort on (asc / desc) rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.columnTitle.name=Column Title rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.columnTitle.description=Title to use for the group column rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.aggregateTitle.name=Aggregate Column Title rendering.macro.awmchart.parameter.aggregateTitle.description=Title to use for the aggregate column awm.statistics.title=Statistics and Charts awm.statistics.desc=This screens shows AppWithinMinutes statistics: awm.statistics.field=Field: awm.statistics.type=Type: awm.statistics.type.pie=Pie awm.statistics.type.bar=Bar awm.statistics.type.bar3D=Bar 3D awm.statistics.function=Function (optional): awm.statistics.aggregate=Aggregate (optional): awm.statistics.aggregateFunction=Aggregate Function (optional): awm.statistics.continue=Continue awm.statistics.insert=To insert this chart in another page use the following code: awm.statistics.chooseapp=Choose Application: awm.statistics.chooseclass=Choose Class: awm.statistics.showclasses=Show classes awm.statistics.panel.title=Charts
